transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ma'am bataiye.
Executive: Ji ji, achha services mein baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan haan, aapko toh maine bahut baar phone kiya official time pe. Abhi toh mere paas abhi system bhi nahi hai. Office bhi chutti ho gaya.
Executive: Nahi nahi, bas mujhe confirm karna tha. Aapki baat ho gayi Haider Ali se? Aapne documents wagera share kar diye unko?
Customer: Document share kar diya hai. But Haider Ali ko maine do baar phone kiya toh phone receive hi nahi kiya sir.
Executive: Achha achha achha theek hai, koi baat nahi. Toh theek hai aap abhi abhi kya kehte hain aapka official time khatam ho gaya hai kya?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Achha theek hai. Kal aap morning mein ek baar Haider Ali se coordinate kariye. Unko documents wagera jo bhi required hai aap share kar dijiye, theek hai?
Customer: Share kar diya hai.
Executive: Share kar diya hai na?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai. Theek hai jaisa bhi rehta hai ma'am main ek baar aapko kal update...
Customer: Kab tak close hoga ma'am? Yeh bata sakte hain aap?
Executive: Haan ma'am complaint ke regarding hi discuss karna chah rahi thi. Toh ek baar main Haider Ali se coordinate karke kal aapse baat karti hoon, theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Chaliye okay ma'am, thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know when the complaint will be closed.
- Stated that documents have already been shared.
- Mentioned that calls to Haider Ali were not answered.

Resolution:

- Confirmed that the customer has shared the documents.
- Advised to coordinate with Haider Ali the next morning.
- Promised to coordinate internally and call back the next day.

Next Steps: 
- Issue not resolved.
- Executive will coordinate with Haider Ali and call the customer back the next day.

Alert (If Any):
- complaint

@@@Sentiment:
- Annoyed -> Neutral

@@@Key Topics:
- complaint, document submission, follow-up, coordination
